tasks.label: fetch & merge node-app-template/main (allow unrelated histories)
tasks.command: git fetch node-app-template && git merge --allow-unrelated-histories node-app-template/main

tasks.label: fetch & merge node-app-template/main
tasks.command: git fetch node-app-template && git merge node-app-template/main

tasks.label: cleanup branch
tasks.command: git switch main && git pull && git fetch --prune && git branch -vv | grep ': gone]' | awk '{print $1}' | xargs -r git branch -d
